description: The Second Doctor was portrayed by Patrick Troughton, whose serials were more action-oriented than those of his predecessor. After The Highlanders, stories moved away from the purely historical ones that featured during William Hartnell's tenure; instead, any historical tales also included a science fiction element. Patrick Troughton retained the role until the last episode of The War Games when members of the Doctor's race, the Time Lords, put him on trial for breaking the laws of time. The Doctor was forced to regenerate and thereafter exiled on Earth.

episodes.description: The newly regenerated Doctor, along with Ben and Polly, arrive on the planet Vulcan and discover a plot by the Daleks to conquer the human colony.
The Doctor, Ben, and Polly arrive in Scotland during the aftermath of the Battle of Culloden and meet a young Highlander named Jamie McCrimmon.
The TARDIS crew arrive on an underwater base where they discover a mad scientist's plot to raise Atlantis.
The Doctor and his companions arrive on the Moonbase in 2070 and uncover a Cyberman plot to take over the base.
The Doctor, Ben, Polly, and Jamie arrive at a colony where the inhabitants are being controlled by giant crab-like creatures called the Macra.
The TARDIS arrives at Gatwick Airport where the Doctor and his companions uncover a plot by the Chameleons to replace humans with duplicates.
The Doctor and Jamie are drawn into a trap by the Daleks who seek the 'Human Factor' to make themselves invincible.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Victoria join an archaeological expedition to the planet Telos and discover the tomb of the Cybermen.
The Doctor and his companions arrive in Tibet in 1935 and encounter the Yeti and the Great Intelligence.
The Doctor and his companions arrive in a future Earth undergoing a new ice age and encounter the Ice Warriors.
The Doctor discovers that he is the double of Salamander, a ruthless dictator, and works to bring about his downfall.
The Doctor and his companions return to London and find it overrun by the Yeti and the Great Intelligence.
The Doctor and his companions investigate a series of mysterious gas leaks from a North Sea refinery.
The Doctor and Jamie arrive on a space station called the Wheel and uncover a Cyberman plot to invade Earth.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe arrive on the planet Dulkis and face the Dominators and their robotic Quarks.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe are transported to a strange land where fiction becomes reality.

episodes.title: Episode 1
enemies: The Master of the Land of Fiction

episodes.description: The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe uncover a Cyberman plot to invade Earth with the help of Tobias Vaughn.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe arrive on a planet where the Gonds are enslaved by the Krotons.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe arrive in a future Earth where they must stop the Ice Warriors from taking over the T-Mat transportation system.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe become involved in a conflict between space pirates and the Earth Space Corps.
The Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe discover that a series of war zones are being controlled by the War Lords and must stop their plans.
